about_the_game:
Military Tanks is one of the best free-to-play tank games available today! Dive into this modern tank warfare game, where you can engage in fast-paced, realistic tank battles with millions of players from all over the world. Command armored vehicles, from light tanks to heavy tanks, and experience the thrill of real-time PvP combat.

Join players in tactical team-based battles across a variety of battle arenas, where every decision counts. With customizable tanks and extensive tank upgrades, you’ll be able to build your own war machine, unlocking modern tanks with unique abilities.

Military Tanks offers a blend of realistic tank simulation and an engaging arcade-style shooter, giving players an immersive and exciting experience. Whether you prefer fast tank tactics or strategic planning, this game has something for everyone.

FEATURES:

Variety tanks: Choose from light, medium, and heavy tanks, each offering different speeds and strengths for dynamic tank physics.

Upgrades and customization: Modify your battle tanks with advanced weapons and equipment to gain the upper hand in combat.

Global tournaments and leaderboards: Compete in global PvP to top the tank battle leaderboards and show off your skills.

Destructible environments: Fight in real-time tank battles with destructible environments, adding a layer of strategy to your gameplay.

Modern tank tactics: Lead your team through strategic maneuvers in team-based multiplayer battles, dominating the battlefield.

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER AND MAP VARIETY:

Take part in multiplayer tank battles across realistic maps and diverse terrains. Explore desert battlefields, mountain passes, winter plains, and more, with detailed environments designed for intense tank combat.

PERFORMANCE AND OPTIMIZATION:

The game is fully optimized for most modern gaming devices, ensuring high FPS and seamless gameplay. The tank destruction physics and stunning 3D graphics provide an unmatched immersive experience. Additionally, Military Tanks is regularly updated with new tanks, maps, and special events to keep the action fresh.

Join the fight today, build your perfect tank, and dominate the battlefield in this modern tank shooter! Experience fast-paced tank action, unlock new technologies, and climb the ranks to become the ultimate tank commander.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Fedora, Ubuntu
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 630 or similar (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: Military Tanks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Q6600 & AMD Athlon II X4 640 AM3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon RX 460 or Intel HD 630 (2GB VRAM) DirectX 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Do you like tanks game? Are you ready to feel the full power of a tank games?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Russian*, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
